dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Shanna Gordon
dmca.body:
October 11, 2006

Sent by: Shanna Gordon
Gordie429@yahoo.com

1228 W Lunt
Chicago, IL 60626

Recipient Information:
Private
Google, Inc.
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA

Sent via: US Mail
Re: Copyright Complaint

Good day,

1. I am contacting you in refards to http://rogersparchivist.blogspot.com, the images and text boxes displayed were stolen from my personal photo website and from my site on myspace.com and posted without my consent or permission.

2. All the images are listed below:

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3168/3744/400/pimpshos.jpg

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3168/3744/400/sisters.jpg

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3168/3744/400/shirtlessdon.jpg

http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/3168/3744/400/momghetto.jpg

And the text box from my site:
http://rogersparchivist.blogspot.com/2006/09/click-on-picture-for-bette_11576644024485071.html

3. Shanna Gordon
Gordie429@yahoo.com
773.991.0101 (cell phone)
773.262.9471 (home phone)

4. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by myself or the copyright owner(s), their agent(s), or the law."

5. "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner(s) of an exclusive right that is allefefly infringed."

6. I request that you preserve all removed documents and locations thereof due to further ongoing legal action(s).

Sincerely,

Shanna Gordon
